Emily Lu is should be living her dream, attending the prestigious Idaho Writers’ Workshop and living with her girlfriend after escaping their homophobic families. Instead, she wakes from a nightmare every morning, stalked by the monolithic Goddess of Drought. A comic about love, abuse, terrible white writers, and what it means to “go crazy.” Dark slice of life, published June 2017. Available as a 48pg zine.

About Flygirl Satellite Ants Winning Sex 17 Seconds The Goddess of Drought This is What it's Like Prints
